name: ColorCalculator
0:
”Alexa, ask Color Calculator to convert red forty, green one hundred, blue ten to HEX”
”Alexa, ask Color Calculator what is f f zero six a six in RGB”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color calculator
des: With Color Calculator you can easily convert RGB values to HEX and vice versa. Simply ask Alexa to "convert red 200, green 150, blue 40 to HEX" and Alexa will output your number for you slow enough that you have enough time to write it down.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
